document_data.name: Korrunhel Dynasty
document_data.mainbody: The '''Korrunhel''' family was a noble house of [[Tethyr]] that held the throne under the [[Shoon Imperium]], becoming the third of the [[Shoon Traitorum]] dynasties.
document_data.History: The Korrunhels became royalty through the actions of their founder, [[Matamid Korrunhel]]. Matamid served the previous king, [[Emyr Cormal]], as his vizier and regent due to his young age. King Emyr eventually came of age and ruled for a time, but failed to produce an heir before his early death. The throne ultimately went to Matamid, whose dynasty ruled until the marriage of Queen [[Vajra Korrunhel|Vajra]] with [[Karazir Tiiraklar]], leading to the [[Tiiraklar Dynasty]].
